### Older Versions
For versions prior to 1.0.0, please check our [GitHub releases page](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble/releases), the [CRAN package archive](https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/nimble/), or contact the development team.

## Installation Instructions

To install an archived version:

```r
# Download the source package and install
install.packages("path/to/nimble_X.Y.Z.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source")

# Or install directly from URL
install.packages("https://r-nimble.org/src/contrib/Archive/nimble/nimble_X.Y.Z.tar.gz", 
                 repos = NULL, type = "source")
```

## User Manual Archives

- Current User Manual: [HTML](https://r-nimble.org/manual/cha-welcome-nimble.html) | [PDF](https://r-nimble.org/manuals/NimbleUserManual.pdf)
- Previous versions of the manual are included with each package release on [GitHub](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble/releases) and [Zenodo](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1211191).

## Release Notes

For detailed information about changes in each version, see our [Release Notes](release-notes.qmd) page or the NEWS file included with each package.

## Support for Older Versions

While we encourage users to upgrade to the latest version, we understand that some projects may require older versions. Limited support is available through our [community forum](groups-and-issues.qmd) for older versions.
